items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ZESICA does it again!
items.body: First of all let me say that I love the ZESICA brand of dresses. The quality is great! This dress is so shape complimenting. It's curve hugging, but not to tight. The weight of the fabric is perfect. The attacked belt can accentuate and camouflage the waist. It is a very soft shape of pink. Would look good on just about every skin tone. I purchased it in the pink first. I am not a true pink girl, but I am sold on this shade of pink. I received a lot of compliments when I wore the dress. I purchased it in the peacock as well, and received even more compliments. I love this dress. ZESICA does it again! Read more
items.author: Kim Rone

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful dress! Size M
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This dress is the epitome of cozy chic! The ribbed knit gives it a subtle texture that elevates it from basic to stylish, and the cream color is versatile enough to pair with just about anything. The long sleeves make it perfect for cooler weather, and the matching fabric belt cinches at the waist for a flattering silhouette. One of the best things about this dress is how comfortable it is. The knit material feels soft against the skin, making it ideal for all-day wear. Whether you're running errands or meeting friends for brunch, you'll feel both comfortable and put-together. Overall, this dress is a great addition to any wardrobe, offering both style and comfort in one versatile piece. Read more
items.author: Maryia Cuzimencov

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering and comfortable
items.body: Overall great fit. Loved the material/stretchiness of this dress. Length was perfect and v-neck not too low. I'm approx 115lbs. Size 34a bust, 5'5" height in a size small. Read more
items.author: Dallas Peyton

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hourglass figures-amazing!
items.body: This is a beautiful fall dress! Fits exactly as shown. Color is exactly as shown, the dusty blue is very flattering and lovely. It does hug the body but not tight. I bought the xl knowing the large would be snug. I love it. Sleeves are very long is my only complaint. Read more
items.author: BP Mcpherson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy, curvy and comfy
items.body: Love, love, love! This dress feels so soft and comfortable. I am 5’5” and 148 lbs for reference. I bought a medium. The fabric is lightweight and not see-through. The length is perfect, right under the knees. It is very stretchy, so if you want to size down, I say go ahead. I could have sized down to a small, but I don’t like it when dresses feel tight on my arms. You can wear it for the office or for a date night. I think it would look god with some nice heels, but if you’re a flats kind of gal, I think it would look good too. Read more
items.author: Robely Cespedes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars J. Brown
items.body: The dress was of good quality and a perfect fit. Read more
items.author: Barbara Milton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely perfect sweater dress - lovely quality
items.body: I am so happy with this dress! Have lost a lot of weight this year and have dreamt of being in a sweater dress again for the holidays. I was a little nervous ordering this but it looks amazing on my new body. I chose the Navy in an XL. I wear a 16 now and am still losing weight so it'll be fine even when I'm a 14 or 12. I am about 5' 9" and the length is great. I'll add that the quality is much better than expected. Read more
items.author: Stella

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just Not Proportioned!
items.body: Unfortunately, this dress was immediately returned. I wear a size 14 so I purchased a large. Even if I had purchased an extra-large, I doubt if this dress would be a good fit. My measurements are 40 - 33- 43. I am five feet eight inches tall. I weigh 180 pounds. The dress was too tight on my slender arms. The dress looked awkward because the tie is about four inches above my natural waistline. The material thickness was good and the red color was vibrant Read more
items.author: Shvonne

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Red, Redbrown, Navy, Khaki, Pink, White, Apricot, Black, Dustyblue, Darkviolet, Armygreen. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
